summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2999, for the improvement of Rose Court, from 26th Avenue North to the easterly line of block 8, Interlaken Addition; all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with concrete, etc., under Ordinance No. 36138 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
